Sber.title: Sber
Sber.description:
Leaded product frontend development.
Taught and mentored new developers.
Was a team's scrum-master and held agile meetings.
Helped plan sprints and balance load on the team.
Organized and presented on inner meetups and events of Sber frontend community.

NTC.title: Scientific Technical Center «Industrial Safety»
NTC.description:
Maintained company websites and services, as well as developed new ones.
Modernised the tech stack and solved performance issues for slower apps.
Set up and maintained company's web-servers.
Developed an employee request service completed with Active Directory integration.

RGA.title: Russian go-club association
RGA.description:
Developed web and mobile apps for projects "Russian go-club association" and "Starykh gallery".
Set up and maintained server and sass services.
Created a custom CI/CD tool specifically for the team's requirements.
Rewrote auth system fixing a critical vulnerability.
Developed an interactive art gallery in VR.

About.title: About myself
About.content:
I started as a backend developer, then moved to full-stack, and later focused on frontend development.
While working, I understood that I'm good at managing tasks in a team and teaching people about software development.
In development, I'm interested in new ways to develop and architect web apps.
Currently, learning Astro and Solid.js frameworks as well as tRPC library.
